name: BILLBOARD
description: The project’s goal is to use the creator funds to buy billboards and run physical marketing so more people notice it in real life. The token’s main job is to help regular people get into web3 and crypto in a way that feels simple. Its utility is that it raises money by promoting other creators and projects, which helps everyone grow together and keeps the project going. The project's main objective simplified is that it is "The coin using funds to onboard the public!"
